Posts.Content: On 3/14/2007 Inspiration wrote: Hi Shemay - (I hope I got that right) I am trying to find the copy of the Regiman that you follow for Diet. I have one more chemotherapy scheduled, and then radiation.  I am looking at alternatives, and also trying to get the most information I can find on Diet and Excercise.  If you can send me your diet regimen I would be very grateful. Thanks, Shemay!  God Bless You! Sincerely, Lori (Inspiration) :)        On 3/11/2007 Shemay wrote: Hello Dee...... Please send me a private message and I will gladly send you a copy of the Regimen that I follow.... Blessings Shemay   On 3/11/2007 Spritual06 wrote: Hi, I am currently taking chemotherapy for breast cancer and am very interested in alternative methods ( I plan on focusing on alternative methods only after this latest round of chemo is completed in three weeks) . I would appreciate it very much if you would e-mail me a copy of your regimine. I have began to a fruit and vegetable diet and while on chemo daily take ground flax seeds and fiber along w/ organic mushroom builders and teas. I also have liquid B-complex and calcium supplements. Thank you for your positive response.  Isaiah chapter 33 verse 24 Dee
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed and scared

Posts.Content: Hi Shemay - (I hope I got that right) I am trying to find the copy of the Regiman that you follow for Diet. I have one more chemotherapy scheduled, and then radiation.  I am looking at alternatives, and also trying to get the most information I can find on Diet and Excercise.  If you can send me your diet regimen I would be very grateful. Thanks, Shemay!  God Bless You! Sincerely, Lori (Inspiration) :)        On 3/11/2007 Shemay wrote: Hello Dee...... Please send me a private message and I will gladly send you a copy of the Regimen that I follow.... I would appreciate it very much if you would e-mail me a copy of your regimine. I have began to a fruit and vegetable diet and while on chemo daily take ground flax seeds and fiber along w/ organic mushroom builders and teas. I also have liquid B-complex and calcium supplements. Thank you for your positive response.  Isaiah chapter 33 verse 24 Dee
